metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5544 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: OpenSLP as used in ESXi and the Horizon DaaS appliances has a heap overwrite issue. VMware has evaluated the severity of this issue to be in the Critical severity range with a maximum CVSSv3 base score of 9.8.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue is in slpd binary package

criterions.comment: openslp-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
